BriefDescription: L2 cache requests of non-cacheable type (non-cached data and instructions reads, self-modifying code checks).
L2 cache requests from hardware prefetchers to prefetch directly into L2 (hit or miss).
L2 cache requests to prefetch directly into L2.
L2 cache requests for instruction cache reads.
L2 cache requests for data cache shared reads.
L2 cache requests for data cache stores.
L2 cache requests for data cache reads (includes hardware and software prefetches).
L2 cache requests of common types from data cache (includes prefetches).
L2 cache requests of common types not including prefetches.
L2 cache requests of all types.
L2 cache requests for non-coherent, non-cacheable LS sized reads.
L2 cache requests for coherent, non-cacheable LS sized reads.
L2 cache requests of all rare types.
Write Combining Buffer (WCB) closures.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the instruction cache that result in L2 misses.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the instruction cache that result in L2 hits on non-modifiable lines.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the instruction cache that result in L2 hits on modifiable lines.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the instruction cache that result in L2 hits.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the instruction cache that result in L2 accesses.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache that result in L2 misses.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache and the instruction cache that result in L2 misses.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) that result in data cache stores or L2 state change hits.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache that result in L2 hits on non-modifiable lines.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache that result in L2 hits on modifiable lines.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache that result in L2 read hits on shared lines.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache that result in L2 hits.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache and the instruction cache that result in L2 hits.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache that result in L2 accesses.
Core to L2 cache requests (not including L2 prefetch) from the data cache and the instruction cache that result in L2 accesses.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which hit in the L2 cache and are generated from L2 hardware prefetchers.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which hit in the L2 cache and are generated from L1 data hardware prefetchers.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which hit in the L2 cache and are generated from L1 data and L2 hardware prefetchers.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which miss the L2 cache but hit in the L3 cache and are generated from L2 hardware prefetchers.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which miss the L2 cache but hit in the L3 cache and are generated from L1 data hardware prefetchers.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which miss the L2 cache but hit in the L3 cache and are generated from L1 data and L2 hardware prefetchers.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which miss the L2 as well as the L3 caches and are generated from L2 hardware prefetchers.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which miss the L2 as well as the L3 caches and are generated from L1 data hardware prefetchers.
L2 prefetches accepted by the L2 pipeline which miss the L2 as well as the L3 caches and are generated from L1 data and L2 hardware prefetchers.
L2 cache fills where data is returned from L3 cache or different L2 cache in the same CCX.
L2 cache fills where data is returned from cache of another CCX in the same NUMA node.
L2 cache fills where data is returned from either DRAM or MMIO in the same NUMA node.
L2 cache fills where data is returned from cache of another CCX in a different NUMA node.
L2 cache fills where data is returned from either DRAM or MMIO in a different NUMA node.
L2 cache fills where data is returned from either DRAM or MMIO in the same or a different NUMA node.
L2 cache fills where data is returned from either cache of another CCX, DRAM or MMIO in a different NUMA node.
L2 cache fills where data is returned from extension memory (CXL).
L2 cache fills where data is returned from all types of sources.
System bandwidth utilization for fill events that target the same NUMA node and return from DRAM in the same NUMA node.
System bandwidth utilization for fill events that target a different NUMA node and return from DRAM in a different NUMA node.
System bandwidth utilization for non-temporal write events that target all NUMA nodes.
System bandwidth utilization for fill events that target the same NUMA node and return from extension memory (CXL) in the same NUMA node.
System bandwidth utilization for fill events that target a different NUMA node and return from extension memory (CXL) in a different NUMA node.
System bandwidth utilization for cache victim events that target all NUMA nodes.
System bandwidth utilization for all types of events (total utilization).
